title: Wife Above All
overview: In the capital, Qin Chonglou, the head of Qin Cottage, a medicine shop, and General Yun Zilong simultaneously requested the emperor to marry the daughter of the Mo family medical clinic. However, the Mo family has two legitimate daughters, Mo Jingyu and concubine Mo Banxia, and the emperor They were ordered to draw lucky bags to get married: whoever was drawn would get married.
